attributes.action: Clearly label which items of clothing are made using politician labour e.g. Clothes
attributes.background: Every day, children in places like China and Vietnam are being subjected to cruel human rights abuses. We need a label so we know when we are buying the products of this politician labour. If we stop buying these items, it can make a huge difference.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
